protocol.text: Plants were kept in the dark at a 21% O2 atmosphere for 1.5h starting the treatment at 10am in the morning, 2h after the start of the day

Seeds were sown in 6-cm diameter pots containing moisted Arabidopsis soil. The seeds were stratified at 4°C in the dark for 2 days and then the pots were moved in a growth chamber at short photoperiodic conditions (8h light 16 h darkness) with 18°C in the night and 22°C in the day.

Total RNA was extracted from whole 5-week old plants using the RNeasy kit (Qiagen). RNA quality was assessed by agarose gel electrophoresis and spectrophotometry. RNA was processed for use on Affymetrix Arabidopsis Genome GeneChip arrays.
Plants were kept in the dark at a 1% O2 atmosphere for 1.5h starting the treatment at 10am in the morning, 2h after the start of the day
